title: User 'cyberqueen' is in docker group
remediation: Remove non-admins from docker group or use rootless Docker with strict controls.

title: PATH is vulnerable to hijacking
remediation: Remove '.' and user-writable directories from PATH. Restrict perms to 755 or less.
